trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked ask [Please enter a decimal number between 0 and 31:] and wait set [decimal number v] to (answer) set [bit value v] to [32] repeat until <(bit value) = [1]> set [bit value v] to ((bit value) / (2)) if <<(decimal number) > (bit value)> or <(decimal number) = (bit value)>> then play note (72 v) for (0.5) beats set [decimal number v] to ((decimal number) - (bit value)) else play note (48 v) for (0.5) beats end end
